methods.name: loadGoogleApi
methods.docblock:
This function is used to dynamically load Google API script into the HTML body
@returns {Promise} Promise object represents the eventual completion or failure of loading Google API script

returns.description: Promise object represents the eventual completion or failure of loading Google API script

methods.description: This function is used to dynamically load Google API script into the HTML body

methods.name: loadGoogleGsiClient
methods.docblock:
This function is used to dynamically load Google gsi client script into the HTML body
@returns {Promise} Promise object represents the eventual completion or failure of loading Google gsi client

returns.description: Promise object represents the eventual completion or failure of loading Google gsi client

methods.description: This function is used to dynamically load Google gsi client script into the HTML body

methods.name: onApiLoad
methods.docblock: This function is called after Google API script is loaded successfully
methods.description: This function is called after Google API script is loaded successfully

methods.name: gisLoaded
methods.docblock: This function is called after Google One Tap script is loaded successfully
methods.description: This function is called after Google One Tap script is loaded successfully

methods.name: createPicker
methods.docblock:
This function is used to create and display the Google Picker
It also handles the access token needed for authorizing Google Drive access
methods.description:
This function is used to create and display the Google Picker
It also handles the access token needed for authorizing Google Drive access

methods.name: pickerCallback

params.name: data
params.description: The response data from Google Picker after user selection

methods.description:
This function is a callback that gets called after the user selects any file/folder in Google Picker
It updates the component state based on the selected files/folders

id.description: A unique identifier for the component

open.description: Determines if the picker is opened or not

view_ids.description: Google View IDs to be displayed in the picker

client_id.description: The client_id of the Google Cloud application

scope.description: The scopes for the Google Cloud application

developer_key.description: The developer key of the Google Cloud application

enabled_features.description: Features to enable in the picker

disabled_features.description: Features to disable in the picker

locale.description: The locale to be used in the picker

action.description: The current action performed in the picker

documents.description: The documents selected from the picker
